website_summaries.verdict: A versatile stain that's worth considering for customers that plan to use it on lips and cheeks. However, if the shade doesn't work for you, there are no other options by the brand.
pros: Goes on smoothly and doesn't feel dry on the lips like some competing brands
Can be used on the lips and cheeks, plus you get a generous portion for numerous applications
Buildable and easy to wear with other lip products
cons: Color may fade throughout the day, especially when you eat or drink

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the bomb. I cannot overstate how much I love it. The color is perfect but most of all it LASTS. No matter how well I do the rest of my makeup, without a good blush I look wan and sick and people ask if I'm ok. But most blushes wear off so easily. This product is awesome because it lasts all day, which is exactly what I was looking for. It's easy to apply (it has a doe foot applicator) and there is time to blend it in before it dries (a problem with other brands I've tried). Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: worth it even for cheapos like me
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I love it. It does not last all day, but it lasts for a few hours without transfer. WITHOUT ANY transfer! I can finally kiss my boyfriend and drink from a nice glass without transferring color. Best to exfoliate lips before for even coloring because it is truly a stain, and you can layer for bolder color which is so nice. And it's the first stain I've ever tried that doesn't totally dry out my lips. It isn't drying at all. Wears well under lip balm. Just leave it on for a few minutes to set and soak in before doing anything else. I'm totally cheap and this was worth the $15.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I love lip stain. Lipstick never works for me and so I've been trying new brands of stain. This is the first one that wasn't like a marker. The color is nice, once you've put on enough layers. I really am not a fan of the applicator, I would prefer it if it was the marker style. The taste is also not very good. I am glad to have it in my collection, because I like to have options but I probably will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Lovely stain
customer_reviews.text: Great stain, I use it almost everyday both on my cheeks and lips; with the sponge tipped wand, it is easy to apply it either lightly or layer it on to be a brighter and deeper hue. And it doesn't have any weird taste (no taste at all), yay!
customer_reviews.author: L. Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: UMMM Heck Yes!  I wasted so much money on other junk- to get to this! Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Every single one of her products are perfection! Why on earth I doubted this- I’ll never know- It was the last thing I added to my collection BUT the thing I needed most! Yes! This beats NYC Markers, by far exceeds Benetint (sorry but just look at the extra hint of glow this puts off). Love & forever hooked - Especially for “no makeup days” (JUST A TOUCH TO LOOK ALIVE ;)
customer_reviews.author: That One Hippie Chic

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it a 5 except for 2 things. One, it does not last as long as it claims to last. It lasts just as long as any other lip tint. Second, it makes my lips feel dry. The color is great though! It makes your lips look as if you were eating an ice cream pop. But not worth this much because it doesn’t actually last long.
customer_reviews.author: Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a very long time as blush
customer_reviews.text: I love this as a cheek color! It looks so much more natural than the powders or creams I've tried. It doesn't take much so the bottle has lasted me more than four months with daily use on my cheeks, occasionally on my lips. So glad I found this!!
customer_reviews.author: Dopa

customer_reviews.title: Rosy glow!
customer_reviews.text: This tint gives a wonderful dewy, rosy glow--just as I had hoped. It's a small bottle, to be sure, but for me, it takes only a tiny amount per cheek to get the effect I desire. Initially I used too much and had a clown effect, but quickly learned not to be heavy-handed. It doesn't last all day for me, which was the reason for a 4- vs. a 5 star rating. But this is true for ALL blush on me, perhaps because I have dry skin..? I will definitely be purchasing this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: It Works best on Cheeks, not so much on the lips.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping I would be able to have the same excellent results on the lips as I get from the cheeks. I Think it works wonderfully on the cheek, but am still on a quest for lip stain that works with my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Cartier

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, the color penetrates into your skin leaving a subtle, very natural looking blushing effect. At first it seems too bright but it quickly absorbs and rubs out to a natural look. I use it mainly on my cheeks and a little bit to fill in my lips after the 16 hour lip color that I use as a liner .
customer_reviews.author: Julia Prokopuk

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic color and consistency
customer_reviews.text: This stain and the elf stain are my favorite go to’s I prefer this color over elf But both are like the Goldilocks if lip stains and so affordable - this one has the color of benefit’s classic lip stain with MUCH better consistency! Easier to work with- spreads easier and less applications needed. Bravo 👏
customer_reviews.author: Amber H.

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have relatively fair, cool-tone skin and blue-tone pink lips and this is the bomb-diggity for both my lips and cheeks. It is a little more than subtle on my cheeks and blends super well and adds a nice cherry tone to my lips that is very subdued. The stain holds on to my cheeks all day, but not surprisingly the lips need a refresh after eating and drinking.
customer_reviews.author: R E Wilson

customer_reviews.title: really works!
customer_reviews.text: This really works well. The trick is to apply with dry lips and let absorb then apply one more coat and let dry then apply gloss on top. Lasts for several hours and i drink water all day long so i'm def impressed! it's a nice natural color
customer_reviews.author: THERESA MOVILLA

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lip stain, goes on easily, dries super fast, doesnt smudge throughout the day and lasts for hours. I usually apply it agin in the afternoon because it tends o lighten up and wear of some by then, but I think it does a fantastic job overall.
customer_reviews.author: T.L.RN

customer_reviews.title: Love the stain
customer_reviews.text: Love the stain. Very natural and long lasting. I have ordered it 3 times. I use it on lips and cheeks. Wish there was a better applicator for cheeks without staining my fingers. Looks like a healthy flushed glow on my pale face.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice lip stain
customer_reviews.text: Really like the color. It has a berry flavor/smell. It's easy to make it as light or dark as you want. It doesn't ball up and peel like some color stay lipsticks, but it doesn't stay on all day either, but it stays on long enough for me (3-4 hours). I don't mind reapplying a couple times. You don't need to scrub it off your lips at night either. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: SKS

customer_reviews.title: Great cheek stain!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome!!! I use it primarily as a cheek stain💕
customer_reviews.author: Jon E

customer_reviews.title: Nice color but, better for just lips than lips and cheeks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our daughter. I would say this is more for the lips than the cheeks. It does last a while means 2-3 hours before having to replace it. There is no flavor to it which was fine to her and it looks great on her.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W Hise

customer_reviews.title: Only so so.
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as good as the lip and cheek stain I used to get from the body shop. Sadly they no longer have it. I don't like the shape of the jar or the applicator. Taste is yuck.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color actually lasts!
customer_reviews.text: I usually fail at lipstick because I simply do not bother with carrying it with me to reapply. With this, I finally still have some color at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernWitch

customer_reviews.title: Great natural flush!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s kind of translucent so you can build color, which makes the most natural looking cheek flush (it’s ok for lips) I’ve ever used. I have Glossier cloud paint and other expensive brands and I like this much better for cheeks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the "natural" blush
customer_reviews.text: This product is just what I wanted. It provides a soft natural blush for those casual days when you don't want to appear made up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome natural blush product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a natural blush. It works great. Use a little or a lot, and it blends, it lasts and looks natural. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Renee

customer_reviews.title: nice lip stain for fair skin
customer_reviews.text: I received a full size sample in my Ipsy bag subscription, and fell in love. I brought to my sister's wedding for her to use since its the perfect natural berry lip color for us and she also loved it. Unfortunately I misplaced it afterward and was happy to find it available on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Savanna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful natural blush.
customer_reviews.text: Nice blush color, looks natural. Last about 5 hours, which I feel is good. I keep in my backpack, so if I need to touch up. I luv because it's more of a stain.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was not impressed with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I applied this lip stain as directed, but it bled into my wrinkles in a very short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Adaway

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product and it lasted much longer than expected
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product and it lasted much longer than expected. Only wish there were other colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Happy life

customer_reviews.title: Very natural pop of pink!
customer_reviews.text: This product is for my wife. She likes natural makeup and uses this daily instead of lipstick or lip gloss. It just adds a little color to her otherwise nude lips. She said the product can be a little drying if you don't add lip balm after application.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I was using Benefit's Lollitint but it was too drying and uneven. Bought Tints and Sass on a whim and it works great! Even lasting color that isn't drying.
customer_reviews.author: James Newberry

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t stain my lips for very long—but works great as a cheek stain
customer_reviews.author: CoastieVal

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Great suff. Love this. Will purchase again when needed. If you don't want alot of color just coat lightly for evening put on two coats. Just great.
customer_reviews.author: RAVENWOLF

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: ❤️❤️❤️ I love a lip stain! Smells great, no yucky taste. Doesn’t last all day, but whatevs...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I looooove this stuff. I received my first one in an IPSY bag and have since ordered another. It smells great and lasts a long time, even while drinking beer! :)
customer_reviews.author: elo

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I'm unable to wear lipstick/chapstick/lip gloss as it never fails to dry out my lips and leave them ugly and chapped. I got one of these in my Ipsy bag and fell in love so I ordered another! It gives my lips a really pretty color and doesn't dry them out at all. It feels like there's nothing there. I've never used it on my cheeks, but it is a perfect lip stain :)
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Kelley

customer_reviews.title: My perfect MLBB stain!
customer_reviews.text: I got this last month in my BeautyBox5 sub. I immediately fell in love with this stain. It's the perfect shade of red that goes on sheer for a flush of color, and is completely build-able to intensify the color. It lasts better for me than some other stains I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: SwtNdSpcy

customer_reviews.title: so I wanted a good stain. This does require several applications during the ...
customer_reviews.text: My Rosie colored lips of past faded with all the YEARS that have past, so I wanted a good stain. This does require several applications during the day but I like it
customer_reviews.author: Leeann Lewis

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money I do not recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn’t like this at all! It wasn’t a good tint it tasted so bad and it also didn’t lasted like a tint supposed to. I do not recommend this at all it’s just a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Anesha Harris

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is a life saver
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. I use it all the time, gives a very natural look. I love how it allows you to build and that it can just brighten your complexion with just a few drops. One of the best lip/cheek stains out there. Really a life saver in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Poor color
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed, if you want something that’s pale and hard to build color, this is for you. I wish I had saved my money and had not opened so I could return,
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This does well has a cheek stain (have not tried on lips). It had a pleasant smell & color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that is cruelty free so I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that is cruelty free so I bought it to try out and substitute my Benefit Tint, and it is better than I expected! I recommend it to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Have to be gentle with the cheeks to avoid looking like a clown, but once you get the hang of it, this stain has a beautiful effect on cheeks and lips!
customer_reviews.author: Estrelle

customer_reviews.title: I love this lip stain
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip stain! I have used really expensive ones; this one I like better. It stays much longer and it really doesn't spill! Great color too
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing, smells like roses
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing, smells like roses, long lasting, beautiful strawberry stain and best part is this brand is cruelty free
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but needs reapplication often.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but it doesn’t seem to last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Merry Lou Schlarb

customer_reviews.title: best cheek tint
customer_reviews.text: buildable, lasts all day, looks dewy. Container does not spill in your bag so its my new fave alternative to benefit lip tint.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Product does not last a full day. Kind of disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KR Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Best tint I've tried
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth purchase of this product, it is the best tint I've used, the tint stays all day and the bottle itself lasts a few months. I definitely recommend this product 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasts even wearing a mask!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip stain!! It lasts even wearing a mask!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stuff
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stuff! Great taste, no drip, nice layering ability. I actually prefer the bunny foot applicator over a brush; its well-known rival (Benetint) is way too runny/liquid and impossible to apply unless you use your finger. With this, I don't have a telltale red index finger afterward. I like the cheesy packaging and the color payoff -- it works well on medium to olive skin.
customer_reviews.author: uberchick99

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color.
customer_reviews.text: Great as a cheek stain. The color looks deep in the photo, but it somehow translates perfectly onto my skin for a flushed look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has a sticky feeling and bad taste when first applied
customer_reviews.text: Dark pinkish red with blue undertones. It has a sticky feeling and bad taste when first applied, but goes away once dried. One coat goes on dark but fades after a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: E. Systems

customer_reviews.title: Cute and goes on great
customer_reviews.text: I love this it works great, lasts a long time and the color is really nice for the girl that doesn't like the orange tint.
customer_reviews.author: Kym H

customer_reviews.title: Stupendous.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip stain. It's a good color and it stays on pretty decently. I usually use it under Sugar tinted lip balm. I got one of these in an ipsy bag and purchased this one for a friend because I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: ThaliaÂ S.

customer_reviews.title: Better than lipstick.
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as expected and I definitely will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: What I expected
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tint I’ve been looking for. Just a subtle color for my lips for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Best Tint Out There!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I used to use Benetint, but I think this is a superior product. So natural looking and lasts all day (on cheeks).
customer_reviews.author: Josie P

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: 3rd time I have ordered. Easy to use for a little color on the go, when you don't have a lot of time.
customer_reviews.author: carmen a seals

customer_reviews.title: Best lip tint
customer_reviews.text: Best lip tint! Goes on perfectly (feels like a really thin gel) and adds the right amount of color that lasts almost the whole day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a stain
customer_reviews.text: Satin does not last after eating and fades over a hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay on!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. This doesn't stay on AT ALL. I put it on 45 minutes ago, had a coffee and a bagel and all that's left is the outer edges like lip liner. How did this manage to get such good reviews? And even when I applied it the color was uneven because the product is so thin, it's like trying to color your lips with tinted water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best lip stain on the market
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of this product in an Ipsy bag. I love the subtle stain it leaves on my lips. It looks great by itself or under another lip color. And it lasts until I wipe it off.
customer_reviews.author: N. Raftery

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, it stays on for a while and the color looks natural on me. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: sierra johnson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I have been looking for
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It goes on smoothly. It is not greasy and it lasts forever! I have tried others, but this is now my go to. I won't buy anything else. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Galvan

customer_reviews.title: Color stays fresh all day
customer_reviews.text: Color blends evenly on cheeks and stays on all day and night. Stays on lips as long as it sets without being touched for an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Bohn

customer_reviews.title: I have also purchased this product for different friends and family who all love it when I show it to them
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this product through a subscription service (Ipsy). I had never tried a tint before but I now use it every day. I have also purchased this product for different friends and family who all love it when I show it to them. I've yet to see a product in stores that works as well as this tint does. I will be purchasing more soon. Thanks for the easy purchase and shipping process.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn McCarter

customer_reviews.title: Rosy cheeks. Long wear. Stays on oily/combo skin!
customer_reviews.text: Longtime user of Benetint and this is better! And cheaper! Smooth application and long wear for oily/ combo skin -blush doesn’t stay on long but this does !
customer_reviews.author: Mama K

customer_reviews.title: This is the absolute BEST lip stain
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute BEST lip stain. I've tried them all and this one has Tge best consistency and the color is perfect on fair skin tones. I highly recommend this lip stain.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C Forliti

customer_reviews.title: It stays on all day- never fades and gives an amazing natural color
customer_reviews.text: I got this in my ipsy bag and have used it ever since. It stays on all day- never fades and gives an amazing natural color. Color sets quickly so work fast to avoid staining unintentially.
customer_reviews.author: Nylyak44

customer_reviews.title: one of the best stains!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third purchase, i love it so much. I now keep one in my purse for bad lipstick days, and "just in case"--its my *go to* Wears well, is a gorgeous pinky red on my fair skin, is buildible. I will buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: julie schafer

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite products
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, very natural looking and beautiful color
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the name, love the product, perfect pink flush, stays on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: super awesome
customer_reviews.text: its a blush and a cheek stain all in one, which is great because if you think about it it's 4 in one because you can have a sheer tint, or a super rosy tint. And one more thing it doesn't spill I have tried it. its kinda cool for more information please visit
customer_reviews.author: h.rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great color, stays all day! Works best when applying clear chapstick over, to keep lips moisturized all day.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Moles

customer_reviews.title: Absolutly love this product stays on all day
customer_reviews.text: Absolutly love this product stays on all day! Gives me a nice health glow on the cheeks and lips.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A favorite make-up bag addition
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, long-lasting tint, and quick/easy application. The price is great, too!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney A Singh

customer_reviews.title: Should have gone a shade, or even two shades darker
customer_reviews.text: I'd probably have been happy with it, had I bought a darker color. I actually wanted something just a little darker than my natural color. This is almost a perfect match of my natural color. Feels wet and a little sticky until it dries. Fires in under a minute.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I received it in my ipsy bag and used it all up. I had to buy it again because I love the shade, smell, and way it looks!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product and last all day on my cheeks. I recommend and will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: BeeStar

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Horrible stuff. I gave it two stars because it didn't arrive at first and the seller shipped another one right out. But it is really a step down from vaseline, as far as color goes. Because there is none.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: I like the stain idea but found I don't love the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the stain idea but found I don't love the color on my skin type. Its fine but I don't see myself buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen T.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. I love lip stain
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. I love lip stain, but had long ago run out of my favorite (discontinued) brand. This got good reviews so I thought I'd give it a try. I'm disappointed because it takes so many layers to show any kind of color. I'm up to three layers. But the color seems to disappear almost immediately. I have to continue to experiment with it before I give up on it. Four layers? I'll give it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Porretto

customer_reviews.title: Expired product
customer_reviews.text: It stains my lips nicely but I received a product that was expired in January 2016. I received it today March 26th, 2016...
customer_reviews.author: Chara

customer_reviews.title: Love this tint!
customer_reviews.text: Natural looking tint. Easy to use. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim R.

customer_reviews.title: The color was too pink for me, and it ...
customer_reviews.text: The color was too pink for me, and it went on very blotchily. It also didn't last. I won't purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: editrix

customer_reviews.title: Great for layering
customer_reviews.text: Great long-lasting stain, I love to wear it under my favorite chapstick or gloss. You can add more layers for a more saturated color. I posted for pictures of what it looks like after each layer.
customer_reviews.author: Bosphoto

customer_reviews.title: Color me impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have been on the hunt for makeup that is non toxic & natural looking. This was just lovely! Not sure how long tint should last, but the first pic is 2pm and the last pic is 12am. There is still a hint of color and that is after working at a coffee shop and drinking lots of coffee. This usually erodes my lip color pretty quickly, but this tint held it own. Color me impressed
customer_reviews.author: charity whitworth

customer_reviews.title: Fab!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I like the color a lot. I feel like it gives me a great foundation to put my lipstick or colored lip balm over. I find that when I put a lipstick or colored lip balm on top of this, they don't bleed and stay on longer. Also, a little goes a long way in giving your lips a nice stain, so the bottle should last a good amount of time. Good price point, and cruelty free for the win.
customer_reviews.author: Laula W.

customer_reviews.title: My go-to lip tint
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this over the TONYMOLY lip tint trio - which, by the way, tests on animals. Tints & Sass suits my olive skin color the best. Great longevity, too! I only have to touch it up once throughout the day. Plus, Elizabeth Mott is cruelty-free!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: this is the best out of 6 by a long shot
customer_reviews.text: I'm experimenting with different lip stains, and so far, this is the best out of 6 by a long shot. It lasts all day even with multiple applications of balm or gloss over it, which none of the others I've tried do.
customer_reviews.author: CMJ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color, great for gym!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first stain product! I only use it on my lips. I wear the lip stain when I go to the gym because I want a subtle pop of color that won't rub off when I'm working hard and sweaty! I apply a bit of coconut oil on top when it dries and I'm good to go. I like that it is an ethical product and it looks great on!
customer_reviews.author: YogaLife

customer_reviews.title: Almos liked it.
customer_reviews.text: This was too messy for me. It did was not easy to apply and did not last long. Also used on granddaughters for ballet performance with less than satisfactory results. Thanks for asking. Am always looking for a good lip stain. Isn’t much on the market right now.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: The lip stain I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to lip stain. I get compliments on my red lips all the time now and questions about how I keep them red. I am not bothering with any other stains anymore. I may apply a few coats, letting them dry in between if I want a darker color and I will cover it with Aquaphor if I want to prevent chapping or a glittery gloss for some glamour.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels great on my lips!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure that I would like this lip stain initially. I usually prefer a browner-red tone. But I’ve grown to love it. It is very lightweight on my lips. Regular lipstick feels too heavy and ‘icky’. Tints & Sass Lip Stain goes on easily and the tint lasts quite a long time. Very natural looking and feeling. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: I like it, I'm pretty low-maintenance and travel a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Lip and cheek stain. Buildable. I like it, I'm pretty low-maintenance and travel a lot so it's great to have such a versatile product that keeps me fresh and bright!
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty
customer_reviews.text: I like the color on and the texture, but am disappointed once again at the longevity of the color. Thinking it must be me, no matter what product I have tried nothing last through even one cup of coffee, let alone a meal and several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my eyes cheeks and lips and it stays all nigth long! the color is almost like a perfect cherry red and leaves yours lips looking like you just finished rubbing a cherry lollypop all over your lips. I Love It!!
customer_reviews.author: Adriena l.

customer_reviews.title: Quick reapply and you're good to go
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping it would last longer. Wears off in the center after eating. Quick reapply and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Will repurchase.
customer_reviews.text: This goes on smoothly, dries quickly, and doesn't dry out my lips. It does fade after a few hours, but has better staying power than other products I've tried. It's a nice berry color.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Looks super cute when you want to order it but it’s not. Did a trial run and it is not good for long term use. It came off a few min after. Does not stand up to any photos and that’s what i needed it for
customer_reviews.author: AD

product_meta.title: Tints & Sass Lip and Cheek Stain Cruelty Free (10g/0.35oz) by Elizabeth Mott
